entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
